@metadata.name: pickle
@metadata.comment: The library is only partly imported as default, full load is "bootstrapped", and it can not be properly identified. It is nearly always identified by its access points, but together with "pickle" it is pretty safe to assume they can be used as prefix.

pickle.spy 001.description: Warn called without exiting, with caller and arguments, and chain.

pickle.spy 002.description: Warn called without exiting, with caller, arguments and stack trace, and chain.

pickle.spy 003.description: Warn called with exit, with caller and arguments, and chain.

pickle.spy 004.description: Warn called without exiting, with caller, arguments and stack trace, and chain.
